title: Does considering second extended or third round for preparing option list is not good or wrong??
content: Like many people are saying considering the second extended round or third round results for preparing option entry list is very risky and and not good so should I consider round 3 and go with it or should I consider around 1 and round 2 result please help me

comments.body: if you are well within the closing rank (around 500 ranks higher than the 3rd round closing rank) then np otherwise it is a little risky.
Main 50% of them I fall sort of 500 ranks and 50% of them I fall sort of thousand ranks like can you explain what are the risk?? Please.....
